attributes.action: Knife criminals to be sent into a national service scheme for minimum 8 years
attributes.background: start this petition as I feel the punishment received to these criminals is not a punishment but a holiday camp.Being sent to serve our country and learn respect for others an basic morals whilst being educated in skills they can use for the rest of their lives Help our county help our children

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure which knife offences you're concerned about or what kind of national service scheme you want. For example, we're not sure whether you want to introduce a military national service scheme or another type of scheme.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
